title: Oracle $25 Billion Bond Sale Helps Ease Fears of AI Debt Wave
description: For weeks, Oracle Corp.’s debt has been trading like junk amid concerns that its artificial intelligence investments won’t pay off for years, if at all. On Monday, those fears appeared to dim after the software giant garnered record demand for a $25 billion bond sale.
content: For weeks, Oracle Corp.’s debt has been trading like junk amid concerns that its artificial intelligence investments won’t pay off for years, if at all. On Monday, those fears appeared to dim after the software giant garnered record demand for a $25 billion bond sale.
